data.text:
Find Your BOCES and/or Regional Information Center By School District

Search for a BOCES and/or Regional Information Center (RIC) near you by selecting your school district name in the box below.

Search Tip: While using a desktop or laptop computer, after clicking “Select”, you can type the first few letters of your district to jump to that part of the list.

See a listing of all 37 BOCES in alphabetical order below.

See a listing of all 12 Regional Information Centers (RICs)

Where to go for…

Each BOCES in New York state serves a certain region and reports directly to the State Education Department. Please contact the individual BOCES that is assigned to the region where you are located or that is best related to your question. Please note that the “Big 5” school districts (New York City, Buffalo, Rochester, Syracuse and Yonkers) operate outside of the BOCES system. For more information, visit big5schools.org.)

Certification

TEACH online services

Regional certification offices

Employment Verification

To find information about employment, contact your local BOCES (listed below).

Course Information or Course Completion Verification

To find information about courses, contact your local BOCES (listed below).

Vendors/Sales

To find information about vendor/sales, contact your local BOCES (listed below).

NYSED Office of General Services

Technology

Find your local Regional Information Center (RIC)

Media

To find media information specific to your BOCES, contact your local BOCES (listed below).

Statewide: Email bocesofnys@neric.org* or NYSED

*Note: This office will only coordinate the best representatives to comment; comments may be from a different BOCES or a variety of BOCES.

top of page
